homepage.intro: Hello, my name is Artur Marbach, and I live in Hamburg. I am a DevSecOps Engineer with experience in building stable and scalable infrastructures.
Enthusiasm: Experience with Docker, CI/CD, Linux, multi-container deployments, and monitoring for stable and automated operations.
Commitment: I continuously learn new tools and technologies, such as AWS, to expand my skills and execute projects efficiently.
Skill Development: My skills in automation, containerization, and CI/CD enable me to implement stable, scalable, and efficient infrastructure and deployment solutions.
Portfolio: In my portfolio, I showcase selected DevOps and container projects that I have implemented using Docker, CI/CD pipelines, and Linux infrastructure. The source code for all projects is available on GitHub – take a look at the repositories to see how I implement stable infrastructure, automation, and deployment in practice.
development1.description: Deployment of an API including a database on a virtual machine. The project demonstrates containerization, setting up a stable infrastructure on a dedicated VM, database integration, and the basics of automation.
development3.description: Deployment of a containerized application on AWS using ECR (Container Registry) and ECS (Fargate) with a CI/CD pipeline. Demonstrates containerization, cloud deployment, and automated deployments, with a focus on stable infrastructure and DevOps best practices.
development2.description: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on a object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and bottles to fight against the killer chicken
development4.description: Setup of a monitoring system for visualizing system metrics and logs. The project demonstrates the configuration of observability infrastructure.
development5.description: Deployment of a multi-container application with a Django backend and Angular frontend. Demonstrates containerization and CI/CD pipelines. Focuses on stable infrastructure, automated deployments, and DevOps practices.
development6.description: Aktuell arbeite ich daran, die bestehende API mit Terraform auf AWS zu deployen. Das Projekt dient dazu, Infrastrukturautomatisierung und Cloud-Deployments praktisch zu erlernen.
development7.description: A lightweight, containerized setup for running a Minecraft Java Edition Server using Docker and Docker Compose.
development8.description: A Docker Compose setup that deploys WordPress with a MySQL database — featuring persistent data storage, configurable environment variables, and easy deployment.
development9.description: Deployment of a containerized Django e-commerce shop with PostgreSQL, secure configuration via environment variables, and management through the admin panel.
development10.description: Penetration tests and security assessments to identify and remediate XSS, SQL injection, and other web application vulnerabilities.
Communication: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
